name: Cyberpunk Stories: Kaitlin
description:
Cyberpunk Stories: Kaitlin

[ If the HTML5 build is not working. please check out downloads for Win or Lin: ]

A Cyberpunk, mature, interactive, branching detective story with multiple endings (16 combinations)

WARNING! 18+ Mature content, bad language, violence, suicide


Controls:

On mobile/with mouse:

touch/click left or right side of the screen to run,

touch /click to select dialogue options

On keyboard:

A/D or arrows to move

S or down arrow or Ctrl to switch between walking and running

W or up arrow or Space to jump

1,2,3 keys to select dialogue options

Credits:

Game & Story by Pawel Jarosz

Sounds&Music CC0 freesound.org
Pixel Art bought on craftpix.net
Cyberpunk font - fontsrepo.com Mykhailo Matviichuk

Made with Defold, used Arcweave, Tiled, Aseprite and Defold modules: DefArc, Defold-Orthographic, Monarch, Gooey, Defold-Printer, Defsave, Log, Err
